column1: Percentage of Deliveries by Assistance In Nigeria

column2: A skilled attendant is an accredited health professional — such as a midwife, doctor or nurse — who has been educated and trained to proficiency in the skills needed to manage normal (uncomplicated) pregnancies, childbirth and the immediate postnatal period, and in the identification, management and referral of complications in women and newborns
A TBA is a person, usually a woman, who assists the mother during childbirth and who initially acquired her skills by delivering babies herself or by working with other TBAs
